modName: Female Forsworn BriarHearts  Briarheart Necropsy condition fix
summary: Fixes the annoying bug where you can't harvest BriarHearts during Neloth's Quest.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#f4f4f4]Note: this is for the Girls Girls Girls Edition and also contains the v.2.0a patch[/color][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2757695]

Soulbound[/url] mentioned in the comments of the original mod that the game checks a certain condition befor you precede to harvesting:
----
[quote]Looking at the quest it has a Perk DLC2TTR5BriarheartHarvestPerk "Briarheart Harvest" [PERK:0401C05B] 

It has a script DLC2_PRKF_DLC2TTR5BriarheartH_0201C05B that searches the NPC for the following conditions:

1. That the quest stage is active
2. That the NPC has BriarHeart "Briar Heart" [INGR:0003AD61]

3. The NPC is wearing ArmorBriarHeart [ARMO:0005D008] or ArmorBriarHeart "Briar Heart Full" [ARMO:0005D008] with USLEEP < Problem!

4. The NPC is dead

After that the harvest notification will be activated.[/quote]
----

so what i did is, i copied the second conndition and replaced third one

link to original mod:
https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62338/?
author: nerdofprey

files.name: Female Forsworn BriarHearts  Briarheart Necropsy condition fix
